archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0871
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to access and report on all of our rated usage both domestic and international so that we are can confirm that all the rates are correct and that we are not overcharging or undercharging our customers or have any negative margin scenarios

properties.value: Reted CDRs feed from Comarch is needed DX: Note require hourly

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
